net.minecraftforge.fml.loading.moddiscovery

Interface IModLocator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJarFileLocator, ClasspathLocator, ExplodedDirectoryLocator, MavenDirectoryLocator, ModsFolderLocator

    public interface IModLocator
    Loaded as a ServiceLoader. Takes mechanisms for locating candidate "mods" and transforms them into ModFile objects.
